title: Market Outlook with Sandip Bhagat, Mary Kay COO on Female Entrepreneurs
itunes:title: Market Outlook with Sandip Bhagat, Mary Kay COO on Female Entrepreneurs
description:
Sandip Bhagat, Chief Investment Officer at Whittier Trust, explains why he is constructive on the economy and markets, and shares his stock picks. Mary Kay Cosmetics Chief Operating Officer Deborah Gibbons talks about creating a women’s entrepreneurship accelerator program. 

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan.

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
